channel.title: Attack Emote on NPCS Help!
channel.description:
For some reason whenever I fight a npc it doesn't show the attack emote. I have uploaded a video to youtube showing you what I am talking about.
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9ZR18vkB6eM
I downloaded this source called Project Sony. It is also Delta based.
Please help. Fixed all of the other glitches......

item.title: Attack Emote on NPCS Help!

item.description:

For some reason whenever I fight a npc it doesn’t show the attack emote. I have uploaded a video to youtube showing you what I am talking about.

Please help. Fixed all of the other glitches…
